meanings.definition: To jump up and down on a pogo stick.
meanings.sent1: She pogoed in the park with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The kids pogoed happily at the playground.
meanings.sent3: He pogoed so high, he almost touched the sky!
meanings.sent4: Her heart pogoed with excitement as she won the race.
meanings.sent5: The kangaroo pogoed effortlessly through the field.

meanings.definition: To move in a bouncy or erratic manner.
meanings.sent1: The ball pogoed unpredictably around the room.
meanings.sent2: The puppy pogoed around the yard with joy.
meanings.sent3: The music made her feet pogo in a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts pogoed back and forth, unable to decide.
meanings.sent5: The bubbles pogoed up and down in the fizzy drink.

meanings.sent1: After the show, they pogoed all the way home.
meanings.sent2: She pogoed across the finish line with a big smile.
meanings.sent3: The cat pogoed onto the couch and settled in.
meanings.sent4: His mood pogoed from happy to sad in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The leaves pogoed off the tree in the autumn breeze.
